statements: SELECT * FROM events WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, event_date, location FROM events WHERE organizer = 'John Doe';
SELECT event_name, organizer FROM events WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, location FROM events WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-06-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT event_name, event_date, location FROM events WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, organizer FROM events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM events WHERE organizer LIKE 'John%';
SELECT event_name, location FROM events WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_name FROM events WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM events WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT guest_name, rsvp_status FROM rsvps WHERE rsvp_status = 'Confirmed';
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location FROM events WHERE event_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_location FROM events ORDER BY event_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM events ORDER BY event_date DESC, event_name ASC
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT guest_name, rsvp_status FROM rsvps WHERE event_id = 123 ORDER BY guest_name
SELECT event_name, COUNT(*) AS total_rsvps FROM events JOIN rsvps ON events.event_id = rsvps.event_id GROUP BY events.event_id
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM events JOIN rsvps ON events.event_id = rsvps.event_id WHERE rsvp_status = 'Yes'
SELECT * FROM events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events;
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM events WHERE event_location = 'New York';
SELECT attendee_name, attendee_email FROM attendees;
SELECT event_name, attendee_name, rsvp_status FROM events INNER JOIN rsvps ON events.event_id = rsvps.event_id INNER JOIN attendees ON rsvps.attendee_id = attendees.attendee_id;
SELECT * FROM events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT attendee_name, attendee_email FROM attendees ORDER BY attendee_name DESC;

SELECT events.event_name, attendees.attendee_name, rsvps.rsvp_status FROM events INNER JOIN rsvps ON events.event_id = rsvps.event_id INNER JOIN attendees ON rsvps.attendee_id = attendees.attendee_id WHERE rsvps.rsvp_status = 'YES' ORDER BY events.event_date ASC;
SELECT event_name, COUNT(*), MAX(event_date) FROM events GROUP BY event_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY MAX(event_date) DESC;
SELECT * FROM event_details;
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM event_details WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM event_details ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT attendee_name, attendee_email FROM attendee_details;
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM event_details WHERE event_location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM event_details;
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM event_details WHERE event_date > '2021-09-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_events FROM event_details;
SELECT attendee_name, attendee_email, rsvp_status FROM attendee_details JOIN event_rsvps ON attendee_details.attendee_id = event_rsvps.attendee_id;

SELECT event_details.event_name, attendee_details.attendee_name FROM event_details JOIN event_rsvps ON event_details.event_id = event_rsvps.event_id JOIN attendee_details ON attendee_details.attendee_id = event_rsvps.attendee_id WHERE event_details.event_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM events;
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM events WHERE event_date = '2022-12-31';
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT attendee_name, attendee_email FROM attendees WHERE attendee_phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT event_name, COUNT(*) AS total_rsvps FROM events JOIN rsvps ON events.event_id = rsvps.event_id GROUP BY event_name;
SELECT * FROM events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM events WHERE event_location LIKE '%Hall%';
SELECT attendee_name, attendee_email FROM attendees WHERE attendee_phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT e.event_name, a.attendee_name, r.rsvp_status FROM events e JOIN rsvps r ON e.event_id = r.event_id JOIN attendees a ON r.attendee_id = a.attendee_id;
SELECT g.guest_name, g.guest_relationship, a.attendee_name FROM guests g JOIN attendees a ON g.attendee_id = a.attendee_id;
